column5: Beautiful, home in Historic Grapevine, lots of great sights shopping dining & entertainment. Near both Dallas Zoo & Fort Worth Zoo, Legoland,Aquarium Six Flags, see a Texas Ranger game. Perot museum, & many other sights. You can have full 12 hour days and not see everything in the area, or just relax by the pool. 5 min from DFW airport, and 2 min from major highways.
